responses: {"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"They talked about different people and who they liked. My opinion on the captions - I think its a good start - its difficult to follow multiple conversations, but I like the idea of using emojis. However it was hard to differentiate between different people since I did not have time to match emojis to individuals. I think emojis with \"gender\" would help me quickly identify \"oh the man is talking\", or \"oh the woman is talking\", reducing my guesswork."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"They talked about lying on television. It was a bit hard to follow as I found myself working hard to try and remember who is female \"1\", \"2\", \"3\". I didn't really have time to absorb the new information."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"They discussed homework/school. I thought this was easier to follow because even though I missed who was speaking (looking at the person), I was able to see the names on the captions and sort of follow it like reading a book."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"They were talking about facial expressions. I definitely liked assigning colors to individuals because when the colors changed, I automatically knew someone else was talking and it helped me separate them in my head and not see it as one long run-off sentence! Only suggestion I would have for this is to also add \"name\" at the beginning of the new talker along with the color."}

{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"This example compared to the first one was easier to follow since it was only 2 people taking turns talking. But I found myself forgetting which smiley face is assigned to a certain person, I think it takes a bit more work."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"They discussed technology and its ramifications. I found this a bit easier to follow since there were only 2 people talking. So even though it said male 1, male 2, I was able to quickly look up and match the voice to the caption because they spoke slowly. The captions is not bad, I think I would have preferred \"names + color\"."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"They asked Nick specific questions and Nick responded. I definitely liked the captions here better, it was easy to follow. Interviewer clearly implied the woman asking questions, and Nick clearly implied the responder."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"They talked about Tom Hanks and Mr. Roger's Neighborhood. I liked the captions here, the change in color easily helped me understand the stoppage in a sentence and the start of a new one. Only suggestion I have which I forgot to mention before is to be careful with the color choice. It is hard to read that blue on a black background, \"dark on dark\" doesn't work well. Perhaps a lighter blue on a black background, a lighter red too."}

{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"They discussed Bruno Mars and how he met the man who is behind some of his music. I was only able to follow along because the conversation was slow so I'd quickly look up and see who's speaking. I still struggle to remember which emoji is who."}

{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"They discussed the women's experience and how they met. The conversation was slow and limited so it was easy to follow, but I didn't particularly enjoy this setup for some reason."}

{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"2","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"They discussed what they liked/enjoyed. I liked having the names in the captions, but I realized I did not like how the caption just continues on one line even if there are 2 names (2 peopel speaking). I would have preferred that if someone else starts speaking, the caption starts on a new line so it does not look like one long run-off sentence."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"They discussed friendship and commitment to marvel world (contracts). Again, I liked the colors and how it would start on a new line. It made it so much easier to separate conversations. Yellow/white on black worked well. Dark blue on black is still problematic. I would also add names to the color as well."}
